name: Dessert Storm
description: Dessert Storm is the sweetest Match-3 puzzler you will ever play! Your task is to switch desserts in order to match lines of three of more. An adorable ice cream man will cheer you along as you complete randomized puzzles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 2 (SP2), Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: vCard with DirectX 9.0 support Storage: 80 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: vCard with DirectX 9.0 support Storage: 80 MB available space
